name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 2: Mega
summary: Become Mega in Fortnite Battle Royale: Chapter 4 Season 2! Ride the grind rails of Mega City and swerve on it's streets on a sports bike. Go beyond the neon towers to the rest of the new biome: Cause havoc at Steamy Springs, drive a Nitro Drifter to the Drift Ridge car track, sharpen your Kinetic Blade skills at Kenjutsu Crossing and more!
